On June 29, Governor Ducey made an executive order to delay in-person schooling until August 17. The reopening plan for CUSD will not change. School will begin remotely on Monday, August 10. This means that students who have elected to attend in-person or on a modified in-person schedule, will begin school at home with CUSD teachers. Once the Governor's order is lifted, we will begin in-person instruction. Students that choose to attend school online will enroll in Coolidge Virtual Academy and start online with Edgenuity.

Returning student registration will open soon and parents will choose their child's method of instruction at that time. Once school begins, it is recommended that students remain in the same learning model for at least one semester.

Information regarding iPad distribution for kindergarten and students new to the district will be provided at a later date.

We appreciate your patience as we continue to navigate this new and ever-changing experience.

post_text:
Join us tomorrow night (Tuesday) at 6pm for the final public forum to discuss the bond election. The forum will be held at the District Office in the board room. We will discuss the cost to taxpayers, explain the information in the pamphlet and review proposed projects. If you are unable to attend and have questions or concerns, please email Alyssa Unger at Alyssa.unger@coolidgeschools.org

Here are a few quick facts:
1) If passed, the bond proceeds will be spent on capital projects in the areas of student safety, Performing Arts Center renovations, HVAC replacements and athletic facility repairs.
2) The passage of the bond will increase the secondary tax rate to $1.74 and result in an overall tax rate increase of $0.33 or $21.28 per year for the average home in Coolidge.
3) The District's bond proceeds will not and cannot be spent on the City Pool/Aquatic Center.
4) If the City of Coolidge bond passes (different from the District's bond) the south tennis courts would not have to be relocated for the upgrades to the City Pool/Aquatic Center.
